description: Explore how blockchain technology is transforming funding for privacy tech projects. This article delves into the use of ICOs, STOs, and DeFi for financing privacy-focused innovations, alongside discussing regulatory and security challenges.
keywords: blockchain, privacy technology, funding, ICOs, STOs, DeFi, digital privacy, financing, Enigma, Tornado Cash, NuCypher
title: Exploring the Impact of Blockchain on Privacy Technology Funding
